QuestData.Title: Ogres & Ettins
QuestData.Description: As with any offensive, you first need to soften them up. We've been having a heck of a time getting in there. But someone like you... well, let's just say I have no doubt in my mind that you can get into the Twilight Gate to the southwest and teach the Bloodeye Clan ogres and ettins a thing or two!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 10 ogres or ettins at the Twilight Gate.
QuestData.CompletionText: What's the matter? You Alliance $g boys : girls; don't have the stomach to get the job done?$B$B<Kurdran gives you a wink.>$B$BNeed me to fly over there and kill them for you?
QuestData.RewardText: That's the spirit, $g lad : lass;! Today's already shaping up to be a good one.
